title: Denys Shmyhal - Wikipedia
snippet: Denys Anatoliiovych Shmyhal (born 15 October 1975) is a Ukrainian politician and entrepreneur who has served as the Minister of Defence since July 2025. He previously served as the 18th prime minister of Ukraine from 2020 to 2025, the governor of Ivano-Frankivsk Oblast from 2019 to 2020, and ...

title: Denys Shmyhal | Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine
snippet: On March 4, 2020, Denys Shmyhal was appointed Prime Minister of Ukraine.

title: Denys Shmyhal inspects fortification construction in Zaporizhzhia sector | Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine
snippet: In Zaporizhzhia region, the Minister of Defence of Ukraine, Denys Shmyhal, inspected fortification construction under the responsibility of the State Special Transport Service

title: Denys Shmyhal holds talks on strengthening air defence with the UK Chief of the Defence Staff | MoD News
snippet: The Minister of Defence of Ukraine, Denys Shmyhal, met in Kyiv with the Chief of the Defence Staff of the United Kingdom, Air Chief Marshal Sir Richard Knighton.

title: Denys Shmyhal | World Bank Live
snippet: Denys Shmyhal was appointed Prime Minister in March 2020. He graduated in 1997 from Lviv Polytechnic National University with a degree in mechanical engineering and earned his PhD in Economics in 2003.
